definitions.text: surface layer of ground containing a mat of grass and grass roots
an enzyme that catalyzes the conversion of superoxide into hydrogen peroxide and oxygen
examples: oxygen free radicals are normally removed in our bodies by the superoxide dismutase enzymes

definitions.text: someone who engages in anal copulation (especially a male who engages in anal copulation with another male)
an informal British term for a youth or man
examples: the poor sod couldn't even buy a drink
